channel.title: OK this is impossible
channel.description:
Im trying to get rid of membership and make everything non-member.
So ive tryed deleting all playerismember but i just get errors when compiling. So what now?

item.title: OK this is impossible
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

press ctrl+f and find everything with the word member in it, and use your judgment on whether or not to delete it.

Also get red of CLmembers since that makes it so you must be a member to wear the specified items.

Read full topic

item.title: OK this is impossible
item.dc:creator: @someone123456 someone123456
item.description:
@someone123456 wrote:

[quote=“ownageownt, post:3, topic:182826”]Search for ,in client.java,

public int playerismember = 0;

and change it to 1. That is the lazy way =]].

Everyone who signs in will now be a member XD.

Hope this helped.

OwnageOwnt =]][/quote]

ok i tryed but that code is not in there.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2008, 07:18:48 PM[/size][hr][quote=“runegay, post:2, topic:182826”]so in find put

(playerIsMember == 1)

then put in replace

(playerIsMember == 0)

then press replace all, its as easy 1 2 3![/quote]

tryed to but after i got done compiled and restarted it still didint work.

item.title: OK this is impossible
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Search for ,in client.java,

public int playerismember = 0;

and change it to 1. That is the lazy way =]].

Everyone who signs in will now be a member XD.

Hope this helped.

OwnageOwnt =]]

so in find put

then put in replace

then press replace all, its as easy 1 2 3!
